message: Leah Brown-murray Depending on the State you live in there are variations of home schooling - some charter homeschooled have online or annex classes available. Some home school families also coop with other home school families for various subjects. Where I live we have about 100+ families that get together weekly for park days and organized sports PE/recreational activities etc. there are also many free online resources for math and other subjects to supplement what you do. Check out Khan academy for instance.
